title: DevOps Engineer
description: As a DevOps Engineer, you will be instrumental in automating our infrastructure and improving our deployment processes. We need someone who can build reliable CI/CD pipelines and ensure our systems are scalable and secure.
responsibilities: Implement security best practices and compliance
Optimize deployment processes and reduce downtime
Automate infrastructure provisioning using IaC tools
Monitor system performance and implement alerting
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Passion for technology and continuous learning
